Guide

Playing with colors, width, height

Colors can be changed in every .html file, on the top, where I placed a style html tag with css variables. If you mind to use only one color, just change the fill attribute of .divider-shape--fill class

:root {
       --shape-color-1: #2E3192;
       --shape-color-2: #27AAE1;
}


.divider-shape svg {
       width: calc(100% + 1.3px);
       height: {0-999}px; 
}
Apply flip, invert

We apply flip/invert effects using appropriate classnames:

.divider-shape--flip
.divider-shape--invert


If the shape has flippable / invertable badge on it, you can add the classnames mentioned upper accordingly. Classnames should be added to the .divider-shape

div class="divider-shape divider-shape--flip"
div class="divider-shape divider-shape--invert"

In case, in result, the shape needs to be rotated 180deg, we can add [negative="true"] attribute to our .divider-shape element.

div class="divider-shape divider-shape--invert" negative="true"

      Animations

      • Scale Animation

        to use this type of animation, please add the following attributes to the .divider-shape

            <div
        class="divider-shape divider-shape--top divider-shape--inverted"
        data-animation="scale"
        data-animation-value="2"
        data-animation-play-on="mouseenter"
        data-animation-pause-on="mouseleave"
        data-animation-duration="1500"
